title: Medial Corticospinal Tract

![Corticospinal tract @OpenStaxAnatomyPhysiology2022](/The Archive/Images/OpenStax Anatomy and Physiology 2e/fig14.28 openstax Corticospinal Tract.jpeg){fig-openstax-fig14.28}

Voluntary movement of Axial muscles @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019

:::{.callout-note title="Clinical Significance"}
Minimal functional significance due to small size

:::



The Corticospinal tract originates from the motor cortex and is an inhibitory tract of the muscle stretch reflex which impacts muscle tone @gangulyMuscleTonePhysiology2021.
